title: Asch project was initiated
particular: Asch project was initiated.

title: Asch analyzed DPOS algorithm’s loopholes
particular: Asch analyzed DPOS algorithm’s loopholes and simulated a simple attack method, and then tried to repair the loophole by realizing a simple PBFT algorithm model(the prototype of Asch consensus protocol algorithm).

title: Asch released the article of the analyzation and solution of Lisk sandbox loopholes
particular: Asch released the article of the analyzation and solution of Lisk sandbox loopholes.

title: Asch code base was initialized on git.oschina.net
particular: Asch code base was initialized on git.oschina.net.

title: Asch realized complete DPOS and PBFT algorithm in its products
particular: Asch realized complete DPOS and PBFT algorithm in its products, and ten machines was deployed to test it. The test results fully met expectations in safety. That is, the whole system would not fork in the circumstance of frequently restarting, unconventional transmitting block, and allied cheat by several delegates.

title: Asch 0.9.1version was released
particular: Asch public beta was started. Many delegates began to participate in tests.

title: Asch 0.9.2 version was released
particular: Asch 0.9.2 version was released .

title: Asch 0.9.3 version was released
particular: Asch 0.9.3 version was released.

title: Asch 0.9.4 version was released
particular: The product tended to be stable.

title: the consensus algorithm was updated to AC1.0
particular: The performance of AC0.5 is not so good. The peak of network traffic (the instant of broadcasting block) reached  1.5Mbps without any transaction. It is reasonable to ensure safety at the expenses of broadband. As a development platform, the efficiency and stability of Asch underlying platform is very important. So it is very necessary to improve broadband. And we took it into action right now. Asch system was updated to 0.9.5 version until August 9th. The peak of broadband reached to 600kbps in the testnet consisting of 49 nodes.

title: Asch mainnet was officially started
particular: Asch mainnet was officially started.

title: the relevant source of the product of Asch was opened
particular: the relevant source of the product of Asch was opened. Code and related documents were  saved on github. https://github.com/sqfasd/

title: Asch 1.0.1 version was released
particular: Asch 1.0.1 version was released.
Light wallet was officially launched.
The problem of unconfirmed transactions was fixed.

title: Asch 1.1.0 version was released
particular: The bug that multiple dapps operate simultaneously was repaired.
A front end dapp page display was added.
A block production state display was added.
The command of starting block production was added in the script of aschd.
The dapp type was updated.
The bugs that getdelegates was broken in some circumstance were repaired.
The bug in the course of installation and uninstallation was repaired.
The query interface of top account was added.
The bugs that reindex may appear with high probability when Asch restarted were repaired.

title: In Sept 2016, XAS was listed on jubi.com
particular: In Sept 2016, XAS was listed on jubi.com

title: Asch 1.1.1 version was released
particular: the bug of synchronization in local area network was repaired and the compatibility testing of new version was added, not accepting the connection of old incompatible nodes.

title: Asch 1.1.2 version was released
particular: supporting i18n.
The problem of synchronization stuck caused by transaction rollback was handled.
The problem of dapp database residue was repaired .

title: Asch 1.1.3 version was released
particular: The problem of transaction malleability was repaired.

title: Asch 1.1.4 version was fixed.
particular: The problem of memory leak caused by request@2.76.0 was repaired.
The special version of node model was used by Asch.

title: XAS was listed on BTCBOX.COM
particular: XAS was listed on BTCBOX.COM (a Japanese international exchange, having been delisted ).

title: Asch achieved a strategic cooperation with Beijing Finance Cloud Laboratory
particular: Asch achieved a strategic cooperation with Beijing Finance Cloud Laboratory, carrying out depository business(customized Asch).

title: Asch 1.1.5 version was released
particular: The problem of stuck block caused by backwards tick was repaired .

title: Asch was invited by MZKG in Japan to conduct enterprise block-chain technology training
particular: Asch was invited by MZKG in Japan to conduct enterprise block-chain technology training.

title: Zhang Shousong gave a keynote speech
particular: Zhang Shousong gave a keynote speech named “block-chain application based on side-chain technology” at Big Data and Analytics Summit of WOT 2016 in Beijing.

title: Asch achieved a business cooperation with Japanese Telecom, issuing digit asset
particular: Asch achieved a business cooperation with Japanese Telecom, issuing digit asset.

title: Asch ecology community released green paper
particular: Asch ecology community released green paper. The chairmans and vice-chairmans of the volunteer association, delegates association and the developers association were elected within one week.

title: Asch 1.2.1 version was released
particular: Asch 1.2.1 version was released.

title: Asch 1.2.2 version was released
particular: Asch 1.2.2 version was released.

title: Asch 1.2.3 version was released
particular: The simple storage function was added(customized by Centrin Cloud).
the UIA function was added.
The transaction ID and block ID were changed into hex format with 32 bytes, and the old data was not influenced.
The account address was changed into base58check coding. The new and old accounts can coexist.

title: Asch 1.2.4 version was released
particular: The address of base58check format was activated after 1700000 block.

title: Asch 1.2.6 version was released
particular: Asch 1.2.6 version was released.

title: Asch mainnet 1.2 was officially activated
particular: The storage function interface and UIA interface were added.
WEB graphic interface was improved.
The transaction ID and block ID were changed into hex format with 32 bytes, and the old data was not influenced.
The new and old data can coexist.
The account address was changed into base58check coding. The new and old accounts can coexist.

title: Asch Version 1.2.7 was released
particular: Bug in submitting transactions in front end was fixed.
Bug in displaying pop-up dialogue box was fixed.
User define node selection function was launched in light wallet.

title: Zhang Shousong gave a keynote speech
particular: Zhang Shousong gave a keynote speech named “Asch2.0--Meeting changes with constancy” in the 2nd China Financial Transaction Technology conference.

title: XAS entered the top 100 list of cryptocurrencies on coinmarketcap.com for the first time.
particular: XAS entered the top 100 list of cryptocurrencies on coinmarketcap.com for the first time.

title: Asch took part in the first blockchain development competition in China
particular: Asch took part in the first blockchain development competition in China.

title: Android version and M version of Asch mobile wallet were launched officially
particular: Android version and M version of Asch mobile wallet were launched officially.

title: the development of Asch 1.3 was completed
particular: the development of Asch 1.3 was completed, internal testing started in the meantime.

title: XAS entered the top 50 list of cryptocurrencies on coinmarketcap.com for the first time
particular: XAS entered the top 50 list of cryptocurrencies on coinmarketcap.com for the first time.

title: XAS was launched simultaneously on coinvc.com and biduobao.com
particular: XAS was launched simultaneously on coinvc.com and biduobao.com.

title: Asch version 1.3.0 was released
particular: Asch version 1.3.0 was released.

title: Shan Qingfeng was invited to the forum of ecological system construction of blockchain in Guiyang.
particular: Shan Qingfeng was invited to the forum of ecological system construction of blockchain in Guiyang.

title: Asch officially joined Zhejiang province blockchain technology application association and became a full member of it
particular: Asch officially joined Zhejiang province blockchain technology application association and became a full member of it.

title: Shan Qingfeng --Founder of Asch, gave a report of side-chain technology and blockchain 2.5 on China blockchain geek summit forum
particular: Shan Qingfeng --Founder of Asch, gave a report of side-chain technology and blockchain 2.5 on China blockchain geek summit forum.

title: CCTime, the first demonstration DAPP based on Asch chain, and the white paper of it were published
particular: CCTime, the first demonstration DAPP based on Asch chain, and the white paper of it were published.

title: Asch officials headed to the disaster area in Sichuan province with the donations from Asch community
particular: Asch officials headed to the disaster area in Sichuan province with the donations from Asch community.

title: founder of Asch attended the first geek summit forum in China and analyzed the cross-chain technology thoroughly
particular: founder of Asch attended the first geek summit forum in China and analyzed the cross-chain technology thoroughly.

title: Asch Version 1.3.1 was released
particular: 【Consensus Layer Upgrade】Keep 20% of the total earnings from the 101 delegates as working capital for the community.
【Consensus Layer Upgrade】Lock position function covers more kinds of transactions which include asset transformation, cross-chain transfer, asset registration and issuance, etc.
【Network Layer】The loading speed of block when rebooting system is improved.
【Network Layer】Connection from versions earlier than 1.3.0 is incompatible by default, but the protocol layer is compatible.
【Others】The zip-up size of asch-js is decreased to 200K.

title: Asch Version 1.3.2 was released
particular: More journals were output when roll back.
Validation rule for transfer amount is fixed, only number is permitted.
Fixed the two bugs which caused the balance of YLB displayed as “NaN”.

title: AschVersion 1.3.3 was released
particular: Fixed the inconsistency problem when the block was rolled back.
Unnecessary block indexes were deleted to improve the write performance.

title: XAS was launched on www.coinegg.com
particular: XAS was launched on www.coinegg.com.

title: Asch Version 1.3.4 was released
particular: The bug of missing mem_accounts table when started was fixed.
Enquiry of transaction details through the uia transaction ID was supported.
Adding new port “/api/uia/transactions/:currency” to acquire the transfer record of the specified asset.
/api/uia/transactions/:address” was changed to “/api/uia/transactions/my/:address
/api/uia/transfers/:address/:currency was changed to /api/uia/transactions/my/:address/:currency.
Auto test of multiple nodes of Asch.
If no limitation is sent, 20 records will be displayed by default when inquiring transaction related information.
New port--/api/accounts/new, was added.
Fixed the bugs in uia test sample.
Corrected the row number of mem_accounts returned from /api/accounts/count port.
Fixed the bugs of repeated transfer in Asch wallet caused by sending multiple request.
Auto tuning function is added to check the time difference, which can help to eliminate the post requests that may cause wrong timestamps.
The sodium of  package.json. was modified into Version 2.0.1.
/api/transactions added an “and” option, default is 0.

title: the development document of Asch DAPP is published on github
particular: the development document of Asch DAPP is published on github.

title: XAS was launched on transaction platform
particular: https://www.chaoex.com
https://www.coolcoin.com
https://www.coinegg.com
https://www.kucoin.com/

title: Asch released new official website with asch.io as new domain name
particular: Asch released new official website with asch.io as new domain name.

title: XAS was launched on https://www.bit-z.com/
particular: XAS was launched on https://www.bit-z.com/.

title: XAS was launched on http://www.xbrick.io.
particular: XAS was launched on http://www.xbrick.io.

title: the first airdrop of CCTime to XAS/BTC/ETH/BTS was completed
particular: the first airdrop of CCTime to XAS/BTC/ETH/BTS was completed, 1000,000,000 XCT in total was distributed in the airdrop. CCTime is the first DAPP based on Asch chain with XCT as its token.

title: explorer.asch.io, the blockchain explorer developed by Asch was launched officially
particular: explorer.asch.io, the blockchain explorer developed by Asch was launched officially.

title: Asch won the third prize and the best popularity reward
particular: the 2nd blockchain technology innovation and application competition in China came to an end, Asch won the third prize and the best popularity reward.

title: source code of CCTime was opened on github
particular: source code of CCTime was opened on github.

title: airdrop stage II of CCTime was launched
particular: airdrop stage II of CCTime was launched.

title: version 1.3.5 of Asch was released
particular: A new lock position can be set if it’s higher than the current lock position, this function will come into effect when the block height reaches 4290000.
Stability of the wallet is improved, the probability of transfer failure is significantly reduced (the previous page has already supported load balancing and high availability) when using web wallet.
Multi-nodes selection is supported when upgrading or rebuilding.
Enhancement of security, the issue of the dependency library security is modified.
Fixed other bugs.
